abstract: Roman Polanski, whose extradition from Poland is being sought by the United States, says he trusts Poland’s judiciary system.
snippet: Roman Polanski, whose extradition from Poland is being sought by the United States, says he trusts Poland’s judiciary system.

headline.main: Polanski Says He'll Cooperate With Poland as It Weighs Extradition Request
headline.print_headline: Polanski Says He’ll Talk With Polish Officials
